description: Easy to moderate trail 3.2kms (loop return) from the trailhead just off 5th Avenue in Montrose to the farthest viewpoint and then back to the trailhead. If you are heading to the Flag viewpoint.1 1/2 to make the full loop of the Antenna Trail Loop. Plan for an extra hour to head up to the Flag Viewpoint, making it 2 1/2 hours depending on rest stops.
directions: Trail Access: The Village of Montrose, 10 to 15 minutes from downtown Trail BC, Canada. Take the 5th Street left and turn past the Village Works station, down past the Church and then turn right and you'll see the wooden Trailhead awning building structure. Dog litter bags are provided for your pets.
title: Antenna Trail Loop
